name: Eat This Now! (Scala)
body:
Pragmatically, Eat This Now! is a dummy project Iâ€™m using to kick the tires on various web development frameworks. I plan to build it multiple times to feel out strengths and weaknesses of each framework/language. This version is written using Play Framework 2.0, in Scala.

Functionally, it is an app that reminds you to eat leftovers or other food items before they go bad.
tagline: Or: How I learned to stop worrying and love the Play Framework
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
